articles.title: Europe’s Long Awaited Ariane 6 Rocket Suffers Anomaly During Its Debut Flight - Gizmodo
articles.description: The Ariane 6 rocket's first launch faced a second stage anomaly, preventing planned deorbit, as Europe aims to regain access to space.
articles.content: The inaugural launch of Europe’s next-gen rocket has been a long time in the making, and it almost went by without a hitch until a second stage anomaly caused an Ariane 6 launch failure, marring its … [+3367 chars]

articles.content: Indian researchers have developed a new online tool that promises to significantly improve the performance of the upcoming Thirty Meter Telescope (TMT), one of the largest ground-based telescopes set… [+1688 chars]
